title: Sizing Issue
complaint_description: Item size does not match description (ordered L, received XL).
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Offer partial refund if customer keeps the item and it fits acceptably.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #3112. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
